lyrics.text:
Kuo tuku ‘e he Tamai
‘A e Laumālie lelei
Kia Sīsū ko e ‘Alo,
Ko hotau fakamo’ui.

Pea na’e pani’aki
‘O lahi ‘aupito hake;
‘I he kakai kotoa pē
‘O taau mo e ‘Eiki tauhi.

Pea na’e ‘ia Sīsū
‘A e loto ‘o e Tamai
Ke ne fakahā totonu,
‘I he ngaahi me’a lahi.

‘A e kakai angahala.
Ke mou fai talangofua
Ki he fekau angatonu,
‘O hotau ‘Otua ‘ofa.

Kuo tō ‘a e matapā
‘O homou fale pōpula;
Ko e mata kai ‘o Sīsū
‘A māmani kotoa pē.
